Yonas was an agent of the Harpers who operated throughout Western Heartlands during the late 15 century DR.
He was somewhat careless and became 
Yonas wore a suit of padded armor and wielded a crossbow in battle.
In the , Yonas, Meygan, and Lassandra embarked on a mission through the Shadow-cursed Lands, having embarked from the Last Light Inn. During their expedition, Yonas strayed too far from the torchlight provided by his allies and was abducted by a shadow. In short order, he was transformed into a malformed husk that resembled something akin to a zombie.
